   random_company_type_4 AS ct,
   random_keyword_4 AS k,
   random_movie_companies_4 AS mc,
   random_movie_info_4 AS mi,
   random_movie_keyword_4 AS mk,
   random_title_4 AS t
WHERE t.id = mk.movie_id
AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
AND t.id = mc.movie_id
AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
AND mc.company_id = cn.id
AND mi.movie_id = t.id
AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND cn.country_code != '[pe]'
AND (cn.name LIKE '%FrÃ¨res%' OR cn.name LIKE '%NBC%')
AND ct.kind = 'distributors'
AND k.keyword = 'based-on-novel'
AND mc.note IS NULL
AND mi.info IN ('Mono', 'Mono', 'Mono', 'Mono', 'Mono')
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1919 AND 2009;
